ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Spacer weapons - Bounce Gun
ModMetaData.description:
Mod Adds Several new Powerful Ricochet bounce guns to the Spacer factions and trade inventories.
Repulse guns Are special made spacer tech weapons that fires projectiles that bounce from target to target in an attempt to hit as many opponents as possible, Higher skilled shooters will find the weapons to Ricochet more often allowing for more powerful strikes per volley,
The weapons can only be found as quest rewards, on trader caravans, and Spacer factions such as the imperials of the royalty DLC, or any custom spacer factions you might have installed.
